features.title: Direct Mill Sourcing
features.description: No middlemen. We work directly with farmers and millers across key production zones for competitive FOB/CIF pricing.

features.title: Quality Assurance
features.description: NABL lab testing, APEDA registered, FSSAI licensed. Optional SGS/Bureau Veritas pre-shipment inspection available.

features.title: Global Export Ready
features.description: Full documentation support: Phytosanitary, Certificate of Origin, Fumigation certificates. LC/DP/Advance payment terms.

services.headline: Premium Indian Grains & Pulses
services.subheadline: From the heartland of India to global markets. We specialize in export-quality rice, pulses, and wheat with rigorous quality control and flexible packaging options.

items.title: 1121 Basmati Rice
items.description: Premium Sella, Steam, and Golden Sella variants. AGL 8.3mm+, <2% broken. Sourced from Punjab and Haryana. Available in bulk PP bags and private label packaging.

items.title: Non-Basmati Rice
items.description: IR-64, Sona Masoori, Parboiled varieties. Double polished, 5% broken grade. Ideal for institutional buyers and food processors. Competitive CIF rates.

items.title: Kabuli Chickpeas
items.description: Bold grade 8mm, 9mm, 10mm. 99%+ purity, <12% moisture. Machine cleaned and sortex processed. Available for bulk export with flexible MOQ.

items.title: Red Lentils & Pulses
items.description: Masoor Dal (Football/Split), Toor Dal, Moong Dal, Chana Dal. 99.5%+ purity. Certified quality with full traceability from farm to port.

items.title: Wheat & Flour
items.description: Whole wheat grains and processed atta (wheat flour). Premium MP and Punjab varieties. Custom milling specifications available for bulk orders.
